description: Implements CASCADE-inspired study dashboard UI to replace blank interface in zeroTrace AI Chrome extension
target: Fill empty/blank study interface with rich, interactive dashboard components
design_inspiration: CASCADE GenAI Study Companion - Modern glassmorphism design with progress tracking
problem_solved: Replace blank black screen with engaging study dashboard like CASCADE
instructions: This fixes the blank interface issue by adding complete study dashboard UI
Creates CASCADE-inspired layout with progress tracking, study cards, and quick actions
Uses glassmorphism design with gradients, blur effects, and interactive elements
Integrates with existing zeroTrace AI functionality and storage
All components are responsive and match zeroTrace's dark theme
After applying: reload extension and click Study mode to see rich dashboard

actions.description: Main study dashboard component with CASCADE-inspired layout
actions.content:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './StudyDashboard.css'; const StudyDashboard = () => { const [userStats, setUserStats] = useState({ streak: 7, problemsSolved: 45, studyTime: '12h', dailyProgress: 70, todayMinutes: 63, dailyGoal: 90, todayProblems: 5, problemGoal: 7 }); const [studyPlans, setStudyPlans] = useState([ { id: 1, title: 'Dynamic Programming', description: 'Master 1D and 2D DP patterns', progress: 65, difficulty: 'medium', isActive: true, topics: ['1D DP', '2D DP', 'State Machines'], timeEstimate: '2-3 weeks' }, { id: 2, title: 'Graph Algorithms', description: 'DFS, BFS, and shortest paths', progress: 20, difficulty: 'hard', isActive: false, topics: ['DFS/BFS', 'Dijkstra', 'Topological Sort'], timeEstimate: '3-4 weeks' }, { id: 3, title: 'Binary Search', description: 'Master search patterns and variations', progress: 85, difficulty: 'easy', isActive: false, topics: ['Basic Binary Search', 'Search on Answer', 'Matrix Search'], timeEstimate: '1-2 weeks' } ]); const [recentActivity, setRecentActivity] = useState([ { id: 1, type: 'success', title: 'Two Sum', subtitle: 'Solved in 8 minutes', time: '2 hours ago', icon: '✅' }, { id: 2, type: 'practice', title: 'Binary Search', subtitle: 'Practiced 3 problems', time: 'Yesterday', icon: '🔄' }, { id: 3, type: 'streak', title: '7-day streak', subtitle: 'Keep it up!', time: 'Today', icon: '🔥' }, { id: 4, type: 'achievement', title: 'Speed Demon', subtitle: 'Solved 5 problems in 1 hour', time: '2 days ago', icon: '⚡' } ]); const CircularProgress = ({ percentage, size = 120 }) => { const radius = (size - 16) / 2; const circumference = radius * 2 * Math.PI; const strokeDasharray = `${percentage * circumference / 100} ${circumference}`; return (
{percentage}% Daily Goal
); }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Welcome back! 👋

Ready for your coding practice session?

🔥
{userStats.streak} Day Streak
🧮
{userStats.problemsSolved} Problems Solved
⏱️
{userStats.studyTime} Study Time
{/* Daily Progress Section */}

📊 Today's Progress

⏱️ {userStats.todayMinutes}/{userStats.dailyGoal} minutes today
🧮 {userStats.todayProblems}/{userStats.problemGoal} problems completed
🎯 On track to meet daily goals!
{/* Study Plan Cards */}

📚 Your Study Plan

{studyPlans.map(plan => (

{plan.title}

{plan.difficulty.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + plan.difficulty.slice(1)}
{plan.isActive &&
🎯 Current Focus
}

{plan.description}

{plan.topics.map((topic, index) => ( {topic} ))}
{plan.progress}% Complete {plan.timeEstimate}
))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

⚡ Quick Actions

{/* Recent Activity */}

📝 Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map(activity => (
{activity.icon}
{activity.title} {activity.time}

{activity.subtitle}

))}
); }; export default StudyDashboard;

actions.description: CASCADE-inspired styles for study dashboard with glassmorphism effects
Replace blank study panel with rich StudyDashboard component
